Articles.Content:
Well, I was needing some building music again. So I created a lil fun song to get the brain fluids going, hope you like it. Let me know what you think and also if you have ideas on how to get this craft Munside so far my ideas have crashed and burned...miserably LOL!

https://soundcloud.com/billy-winn-2/building-a-rover-groove

It least to me building a crazy lil rover that is mega fun to drive...but I need to build something to get it to the Mun...
I like yours, but like Planet X the best. This one was okay, a nice groove.

Lol, yes! Planet X is what I use for my launch music. It is easily my favorite as well. Hard track to follow up, I am on a recharge break and was supposed to not make music this weekend...I just couldn't help myself
For the craft to get the Rover to the Mun, I tried a crazy launcher shaped like a Spider. .. in theory it should work. .. in theory...
